title: Gorgeous: Book One
description: Olivia Adams is smart, independent and firmly believes less, is most definitely, more. Nothing about Ronan McKinley and his luxurious yachts and expensive homes appeals to her, but there is no denying the attraction between them.When Ronan makes her a job offer she can’t refuse, Olivia makes it clear she has no intention of anything more than a professional relationship with this man whose lifestyle is anything but “less".But what happens when Olivia slowly discovers Ronan is much more than she ever could have imagined?What if she fills Ronan’s cold, gray life with warmth and color?Is it possible that these two people, from vastly different worlds are actually meant to be?
author: Lisa Shelby
